text: The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade is a parade that happens every Thanksgiving. It is held in New York City. It is presented, distributed and produced by chain store business Macy's. It was provided and started in 1924. The parade often includes many balloons, floats, celebrities, songs and more. It ends with the arrival of Santa Claus, which marks the start of the Christmas and holiday season. The hosts of The Today Show also host this event by introducing new acts in the parade. ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Events in the United States Category:New York City Category:1924 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in New York (state) Category:Parades in the United States
title: Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade
